events.message: I purchased a jacket last week but it doesn't fit at all, and I want to return it for a full refund.
The system has categorized the request as a refund due to customer wanting to return the product.
A customer support agent was assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your jacket and get a refund. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the condition of the jacket so we can proceed with your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, still with tags attached, and hasn't been used at all.
Thank you for the information. We will send you a prepaid shipping label to return the jacket. Once we receive it, we’ll process your full refund immediately.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions on returning the jacket.
We have emailed you the prepaid return label and instructions. Your refund will be processed once we receive the jacket back.
Just following up to ensure you received the return label and to check if you need any further assistance with your refund process.
The return and refund process has been completed successfully. Thank you for your cooperation. We are closing this case now.
